document_data.mainbody: '''Lust domain''' was a suite of spells and powers for divine spellcasters like [[cleric]]s that were granted by [[deities]] whose portfolios were concerned with passionate desire for sensuality, power, influence, or status.{{Cite dragon/323/Seven Deadly Domains|63-64}}
document_data.Powers: Clerics with the Lust domain gained the ability to enhance their force of personality for several seconds through body posturing and movement designed to seduce and distract.
document_data.Spells: Novice spellcasters were able to use the ''[[charm person]]'', ''[[invisibility]]'', and ''[[clairaudience/clairvoyance]]'' spells. Clerics of some experience could cast ''[[lesser planar ally]]'', ''[[scrying (spell)|scrying]]'', and ''[[symbol of persuasion]]''. Those that were masters of this domain had access to ''[[Refuge (spell)|refuge]]'', ''[[sympathy]]'', and ''[[trap the soul]]''.
